name: The Moon Conspiracy ISR#3
description:
Game updated to Widescreen!!!

🕹️ Controls: WASD + N/M for Fire and Jump or Cursor keys + Z/X

📖 Press Jump when in the air to transform into Space ship, press jump again to transform back into a mech.
📖 Pick up, up to three survivors, then take them back to the drop ship. Fight off the invading army.

Indie Speed Run 3 game entry.
48 hours to make a game with the given theme: Conspiracy and element: The Moon.
The dark side of the moon hides the secret bases that have been at war for decades, rescue to the survivors as the enemy attacks and it all goes up in flames.
Stand still for the survivors to board and take them back to the escape ship. Careful not to land on their heads and squash them.
Look out for the enemy mothership.
